itunes:title: Episode 765 - Special Guest Nobel Prize Loser Brian Keating
title: Episode 765 - Special Guest Nobel Prize Loser Brian Keating
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by renowned physicist Dr. Brian Keating to discuss what it's like to lose the Nobel Prize, the politics and PR of modern science and what it really means when politicians say their party is "the party of science...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by renowned physicist Dr. Brian Keating to discuss what it's like to lose the Nobel Prize, the politics and PR of modern science and what it really means when politicians say their party is "the party of science" -- plus why Stephen Hawking was wrong about God and why everyone has a religion.

Listen to Dr. Brian Keating's podcast, "Into the Impossible"
